name: petunia
author: Ali Somay
description:
An eclectic collection of externals from me which are proved to be useful and interesting in my musical journey.

This package adheres to semantic versioning. Details on https://semver.org.

List of externals:
  • rytm: Enables communication with Elektron Analog Rytm MKII which is running OS 1.70 over sysex api.
    The source code could be found in https://github.com/alisomay/rytm-external.
